name: OMI/Excelsior Beacon Center [DEACTIVATED]
description: The OMI/Excelsior Beacon Center offers Middle School and High School after school programs, wellness services, community programs, workforce programs and family programming. Violence Response Case Management: For youth ages 14-17 who are at risk of being in the Juvenile Justice System. They provide One on One case management, school and home visits, group sessions on Life Skills and Healthy Decision Making, attend court hearings to advocate for the client and make referrals to other resources. M
